vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.CashOut (patch_8.sol#22-30):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_8.sol#28)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_am) (patch_8.sol#27)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reentrancyLock (patch_8.sol#29)

solc-version
